Subbed Projects.Show Name: Chuunibyou demo Koi ga Shitai! Ren

Good Comments: It's a difficult anime to sub, and most jokes are either incomprehensible or handled too literally. Overall translation is also lacking. UTW is much better.
Calls Riika's eye the "Tyrant's eye (good), also calls Nibutani MoriSummer and not "Forest Summer (also good).  It carries the humor better than other subs overall.

Subbed Projects.Show Name: IS: Infinite Stratos 2 - Hitonatsu no Omoide

Good Comments: Decent subs. Need to watch their typos, though.
Excellent quality of video. Clean looking subs. AND they do Karaoke which not many groups do these days :)
Bad Comments: :) it's really accurate and are genuinely the best guys
